attributes.additional_details:
Simplify taxation to the following:-

Graduated Income Tax - for all: including businesses, self-employed, employed and benefit recipients: prevent manipulation of profits.

Health and Welfare Tax – fixed for all as a percentage of income: exclusively for the provision of Health and Welfare services.

Local Services Tax - applied by location on every adult and business resident in location. Flat rate for each to cover the cost of provision of local services .

Evolve over time as necessary to ensure universality of application
